generated_pitch:
"Good evening Sharks, I'm Founder 1, and I'm here to present Frobert, a company that's on a mission to reduce food waste and make a profit while doing it. We're seeking an investment of $125,000 in exchange for 20% equity. As a farmer myself, I've seen firsthand the devastating impact of food waste on our business and our legacy. Every year, billions of pounds of produce are wasted due to cosmetic imperfections, and it's not just a problem for farmers - it's a problem for the entire food system.

"That's why I created The Frozen Farmer, a line of super-premium frozen desserts made from the very same misfit fruits and vegetables that would otherwise go to waste. Our products are not only delicious, but they're also nutritious and profitable. We offer a range of options, including ice cream, dairy-free sorbet, gluten-free sorbet, and nice cream - a part sorbet, part ice cream blend that's a game-changer. Our desserts are the richest, creamiest, and most epic explosion of flavor you'll ever taste, and they're all made with farm-fresh flavor.

"By using imperfect produce, we're not only reducing food waste, but we're also creating a new revenue stream for farmers like myself. It's a win-win for everyone involved. Our mission at Frobert is to reduce food waste by transforming imperfect produce into delicious and profitable frozen desserts. So, Sharks, who wants a scoop of this cool business where we turn imperfect produce into profits? We're looking for a partner to help us take The Frozen Farmer to the next level and make a real difference in the fight against food waste."
reasoning: The pitch includes all major factual components (founder, company, ask, problem, solution, benefits, call to action). Minor missing personal details lower narrative slightly. Tone is confident and persuasive.

ground_truth: Hi Sharks, my name is Daryl Braithwaite aka Big D I'm from the Big D of Texas that's right Dallas I am seeking three hundred thousand dollars for 10 of my company sharks every Halloween millions of people gather around the table to bond over the joys of carving jack-o-lanterns but that quickly turns into tears and frustration why because the most dreaded part of the pumpkin carving experience the sticky slimy cold wet mess you end up feeling like this until now sharks let me introduce you to the game-changing solution the pumpkin glove scraper our super long glove goes all the way up past the elbow even on Big D's arms to eliminate you having to experience that sticky slimy cold wet mess that everyone hates and our powerful serrated scraper attached to the fingers allows you to thoroughly scoop out every last string of that disgusting orange guts all I keep in your hands nice and clean and your arm also sharks with two kid-friendly sharks they're kid friendly hey sharks oh garbage I apologize with sizes for kids and adults each kid comes with an initial latex glove two kid-friendly knives so when the scraping is done you can begin the fun sharks we believe it's all about the experience it's time to clean out the mess of pumpkin carving smash the competition
generated_pitch:
"Good evening Sharks, I'm Founder 1, and I'm here to present my company, Pumpkin Glove Scraper. We're seeking an investment of $300,000 in exchange for 10% equity. As we all know, carving jack-o-lanterns is a beloved Halloween tradition, but let's be honest, scooping out the pumpkin guts is a messy and unpleasant experience. Who here has had to deal with sticky, slimy, cold, and wet hands and arms after carving a pumpkin? It's a nightmare, especially for families with kids.

"That's why I created the Pumpkin Glove Scraper, a game-changing tool that makes pumpkin carving a fun and clean experience for the whole family. Our product features an integrated long glove and serrated scraper that keeps your hands and arms clean and dry. The glove is super long, extending past the elbow, and the powerful serrated scraper is attached to the fingers, making it easy to thoroughly scoop out the pumpkin guts. We offer kid-friendly sizes and adult sizes, and even include two kid-friendly knives to make the experience safe and enjoyable for the whole family.

"With the Pumpkin Glove Scraper, you can say goodbye to the messy and unpleasant experience of scooping out pumpkin guts. Our mission is to clean out the mess of pumpkin carving, and we're confident that our product will become a staple in every household that loves to carve jack-o-lanterns. So, Sharks, are you ready to smash the competition and join me in making pumpkin carving a fun and clean experience for families everywhere? Let's make a deal and take the Pumpkin Glove Scraper to the next level!"
reasoning: The pitch includes most required facts (founder, company name, offer, problem description, product features, benefits, mission, CTA). Minor missing details are the explicit mention of an initial latex glove and the word 'tears'. Narrative flow is clear with problem, solution, and story. Style is confident and persuasive.

ground_truth: Hi Sharks, my name is Eric Williams, creative director at Chronos Golf and I'm Philip Lapooz, founder and designer at Chronos Golf. We're seeking 150,000 for a 15% stake in our company. We're an indie putter company that manufactures the most precise putters in the world. You might have heard the phrase drive for show and putt for dough; putting accounts for half the shots of an average golfer, so why are we blowing our money on drivers and shoddy putters? That is where Chronos comes in. We mill our putters down to one one-thousandth of an inch to make sure our putters are perfectly balanced. We start off with a solid block of steel and mill it for over two hours, transforming it from stage one, a solid block of steel, to stage two, a roughly milled putter, to stage three, a more refined build putter. It's a slow, labor-intensive process, but it's the right way to make a well-balanced putter. From there, each one is individually hand worked, including delicate deburring, polishing, and painting, all the while preserving that critical balance. The truth is, there's no putter out there that'll make you better overnight, but ours will help you put more consistently, and that might be the only difference between winning and losing. Plus, they're super sexy, so let's get the devil on the dance floor and give these putters a try.
generated_pitch:
"Good evening Sharks, I'm Founder 1 and this is Founder 2, co-founders of Kronos Golf. We're here today to present our innovative golf putter, the Chronos Putter, and we're seeking an investment of $150,000 in exchange for 15% equity. As golfers ourselves, we know how frustrating it can be to struggle with inconsistent putting performance. But what we've realized is that the problem often lies not with the golfer, but with the putter itself. Traditional putters can be imbalanced, leading to inconsistent rolls and missed putts.

"We've found that golfers often prioritize their drivers over their putters, despite the fact that putting accounts for nearly half of their shots. But what if we told you that there's a way to improve your putting performance dramatically? Our Chronos Putter is precision-milled to one one-thousandth of an inch, ensuring that every putter is perfectly balanced and consistent. Made from a solid block of steel, our putters are hand-worked, deburred, polished, and painted to perfection.

"The result is a putter that is not only incredibly effective but also visually stunning. Our mission at Kronos Golf is to manufacture the most precise putters in the world, giving golfers the consistency and confidence they need to improve their game. We believe that our Chronos Putter can help golfers of all levels win more often and enjoy the game more. So, Sharks, we invite you to give our putters a try and experience the difference for yourself. Join us in our mission to revolutionize the game of golf, one putt at a time."
reasoning: The pitch covers almost all required facts, missing only the exact phrase about "blowing money on drivers and shoddy putters" but retains the core meaning. It presents a clear problemâ€‘solution narrative and uses a confident, persuasive tone, though slightly less punchy than the gold standard.
